example_text: An example of what your site might look like
name: Name

home_page.easy_to_create: It is Easy to Create Website With US
home_page.promote_company: It is Easy to Promote Company By US
home_page.fully_responsive_desc: Your website will look and work flawlessly on any device, from smartphones to large screens
home_page.fully_responsive_modal_desk: Our websites adapt to any device, be it a smartphone, tablet or desktop computer. This means that your content will always look attractive and remain easy to read, regardless of the screen size. We use modern adaptive design technologies to ensure the comfort of your users.
home_page.friendly_support_desc: Our team is always ready to help you resolve any issues quickly and efficiently
home_page.friendly_support_modal_desc: We understand how important quality support is to your success. Our team is always in touch, ready to answer your questions and help solve any problems. We will not leave you without help, regardless of the complexity of the task or the time of the request.
home_page.retina_display_desc: We create high definition interfaces that look great on high resolution screens
home_page.retina_display_modal_desc: We design websites with modern high-resolution screens in mind, such as Retina and 4K. This ensures that all images, icons and text are sharp, so that your website looks professional and stylish even on the most modern devices.
home_page.our_service_desc: A new perspective on success: solutions that inspire, unlock your potential, and open paths to growth and achievement
home_page.web_design_desc: We create unique, stylish and convenient designs for your website. We use modern tools to visually emphasize your individuality.
home_page.seo_desc: We increase the visibility of your website in search engines, attracting more customers. We optimize the content, keywords and technical aspects of the site to achieve high positions in Google and other search engines. Your site will be easy to find and convenient to use.
home_page.web_development_desc: We create modern and high-performance websites using cutting-edge technologies such as React, Node.js, Strapi and Vite. Our approach ensures optimal speed, functionality and aesthetic design.
home_page.responsive_design_dsc: We create websites that automatically adjust to screens of any size, providing a convenient user experience on smartphones, tablets, and computers. Your site will look and work perfectly, no matter the device.
home_page.mission_title: Digital solutions designed for your success
home_page.mission_desc: We focus on functionality, design, and efficiency to ensure your website delivers tangible results. Our goal is to help you build customer trust and convert visitors into buyers. With us, your website will become a reliable tool for achieving your goals.
home_page.help_title: To achieve this, at IV-SOFT we take the following steps:
home_page.hosting_help_title: We help with purchasing hosting and domain
home_page.hosting_help_desc: We will explain all the details in simple language so that you save time and money by avoiding unnecessary expenses.
home_page.take_into_account: We take into account your business and marketing laws for the best results
home_page.take_into_account_desc: your website makes a good impression at first glance and stands out from the competition
home_page.seo_settings_title: We include basic SEO settings in development
home_page.seo_settings_desc: This ensures a flow of potential customers from search engines over time, and you don’t have to order SEO promotion.
home_page.register_title: We register the site in Google and Yandex, install counters
home_page.register_desc: This is necessary so that the site is displayed in search results, and counters will help track how many people visit the site, what pages they go to, and how they leave requests.
home_page.fast_loading_desc: We create pages that load quickly on any connection and are responsive to all devices, improving user experience and helping with SEO.
home_page.certificate_desc: This is necessary for the safety of users. It protects data, increases visitors' trust in the resource and increases the site's ranking in search results.
home_page.form_title: INTERESTED IN WEBSITE DEVELOPMENT AND PROMOTION?

pp.title: IV-SOFT Privacy Policy
pp.this_privacy_policy: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the "Policy") governs the procedure for collecting, using, storing and disclosing information provided by users of web applications and services developed by individual entrepreneur Ivan Bezniak, operating under the IV-SOFT brand (hereinafter referred to as the "Sole Proprietor" or "We").
pp.committed_to_maintaining: IV-SOFT is committed to maintaining the privacy and protection of personal data in accordance with applicable laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) and other international standards.
pp.company_may_collect: We may collect the following types of data:
pp.provided_voluntarily: Personal data: name, email address, telephone number, and other data provided voluntarily by the user through forms.
pp.technical_data: Technical data: IP address, device type, browser data, operating system, and website behavior.
pp.cookie: Cookies: To improve user experience and analyze application performance.
pp.data_collected: Data is collected for the following purposes:
pp.provision_of_services: Provision of services and user support.
pp.improving_the_quality: Improving the quality of web applications and services.
pp.marketing_activities: Marketing activities with the user's consent.
pp.stores_personal: We store personal data only for the time necessary to fulfill the purposes of their processing and in accordance with the laws of the user's country. After achieving the purposes, the data is deleted or anonymized.
pp.disclosure_data: 4. Disclosure of data to third parties
pp.does_not_transfer_data: The Company does not transfer personal data to third parties, except in the following cases:
pp.engaging_service_providers: When engaging third-party service providers (e.g. hosting, analytics) who are committed to maintaining data confidentiality.
pp.data_transfer_countries: In the event of data transfer to other countries, we guarantee compliance with international privacy standards.
pp.depending_on_laws: Depending on the laws of their country of residence, users may have the following rights:
pp.request_correction: Request correction or deletion of data.
pp.exercise_rights: To exercise their rights, users can contact us using the contact information provided on the website.
pp.company_takes_measures: We take technical and organizational measures to ensure data security, including:
pp.restricting_access: Restricting access to data to authorized employees only.
pp.company_reserves_right: We reserve the right to change this Policy. Updates are published on the Company's official website. Users are obliged to check for changes periodically.
pp.company_operates: We operate in accordance with international privacy standards and process data in accordance with the laws of the countries in which users are located. When transferring data abroad, we use mechanisms that ensure data protection, such as standard contractual clauses.
pp.have_any_questions: If you have any questions or requests related to this Policy, you can contact us using the contact information provided on the website.

aboutUs.welcome: We are a team of professionals passionate about creating modern, functional and beautiful websites and applications for business.
aboutUs.mission_desc: We strive to help your ideas become reality. Our solutions not only impress with their appearance, but also provide user convenience and achieve your goals.
aboutUs.why_choose_us_desc_1: Individual approach. We study your business in detail to offer a unique solution that will highlight your strengths.
aboutUs.why_choose_us_desc_2: Modern technologies. We use the latest tools and methodologies, such as React and Node.js, to keep your projects up-to-date and reliable.
aboutUs.why_choose_us_desc_3: Experience. Our team has successful projects under its belt, including websites for the delivery of healthy food and massage services.
aboutUs.our_value_desc_1: Quality: We always strive to create products that work flawlessly.
aboutUs.our_value_desc_2: Transparency. We maintain open communication with clients at all stages of development.
aboutUs.our_value_desc_3: Long-term cooperation. Our goal is to become a reliable partner, not just an executor.
aboutUs.out_approach_des_1: IV-SOFT brings together professionals who know how to turn your ideas into successful digital projects. We draw inspiration from our clients' challenges and develop solutions that help businesses grow and stand out from the competition.
aboutUs.out_approach_des_2: Our projects combine stylish design, ease of use and modern technologies to satisfy even the most demanding users.

career.title: Career at IV-SOFT: Discover Opportunities with Us
career.desc: At IV-SOFT, we believe that the key to success is talented and passionate people. Our team consists of specialists who share a passion for technology, innovation and high quality.
career.desc_2: We don't have any open positions at the moment, but we are always open to meeting talented professionals who are looking to grow. If you want to join our team, send us your resume and tell us about yourself.
career.leave_email: We at IV-SOFT are constantly growing and developing. New opportunities appear regularly, and we are always glad to welcome talented specialists. Send your resume and cover letter to
career.leave_email_2: — perhaps we are looking for you!

businessCardWebsite.name: Development of a business card website
businessCardWebsite.what_it_is: A business card website is a compact, one-page website that contains all the basic information about your company, services or products. This website is ideal for small businesses, sole proprietors and freelancers who do not require a complex and expensive website with many features.
businessCardWebsite.benefits_title: Advantages of a business card website from IV-SOFT:
businessCardWebsite.desc_1: Homepage: A brief greeting and your mission.
businessCardWebsite.desc_2: About Us: A description of your company, story, or personal brand.
businessCardWebsite.desc_3: Services/Products: A list of offered services or products with a brief description.
businessCardWebsite.desc_4: Contacts: Your phone number, address, email, and a feedback form.
businessCardWebsite.desc_5: Social Media Links: An option to connect with you through popular platforms.
businessCardWebsite.need_title: Why do you need a business card website?
businessCardWebsite.need_desc_1: Online presence: Your business will be available on the Internet 24/7.
businessCardWebsite.need_desc_2: Customer trust: Having a website increases the level of trust in your company.
businessCardWebsite.need_desc_3: Ease of communication: Clients can contact you directly through the website.
businessCardWebsite.need_desc_4: Promotion: It’s easier to appear in search engines and attract new clients.
businessCardWebsite.conclusion: A business card website is your first step to creating a professional online image. It is a tool that helps you present yourself, tell about your business and establish contact with clients.

landing_site.name: Landing Page
landing_site.what_it_is: A landing page is a powerful tool that converts visitors into customers. With our help, you'll get not just a website, but a working mechanism to grow your business.
landing_site.benefits_title: Why do you need a landing page?
landing_site.benefits_1:
Results today!
A landing page is created quickly so you can start attracting clients immediately.
landing_site.benefits_2:
Effective audience engagement.
A smart structure and vibrant design focus visitors' attention on your offer.
landing_site.benefits_3:
High conversion rates.
Every element of the landing page is designed to motivate visitors to take the desired action: submit a request, make a purchase, or call.
landing_site.benefits_4:
User-friendly experience.
We create responsive websites that look perfect on any device: phone, tablet, or computer.
landing_site.include_title: What will you get by ordering a landing page from IV-SOFT?
landing_site.desc_1:
A unique design that sells.
We will create a vibrant and memorable website that highlights your uniqueness.
landing_site.desc_2:
Texts that convince.
Catchy headlines, strong offers, and clear calls to action — all aimed at boosting your profit.
landing_site.desc_3:
Fast loading and high performance.
Your website will work lightning-fast to leave every visitor satisfied.
landing_site.desc_4:
SEO optimization for search engines.
The landing page will be visible on Google, attracting even more target audiences to you.
landing_site.desc_5:
Support and consultations.
We don't just create websites — we accompany your business at every stage of its growth.
landing_site.need_title: What makes our landing pages unique?
landing_site.need_desc_1:
Emotions that sell.
We don't just showcase a product, we tell a story that inspires people to become your customers.
landing_site.need_desc_2:
A magnet for clients.
We create landing pages that cannot be ignored. Every element says: "Buy, order, try!"
landing_site.need_desc_3:
Future-ready technologies.
We use advanced tools and modern solutions to ensure your site looks and performs perfectly.
landing_site.need_desc_4:
Your idea — our realization.
You dream, we deliver. Each project is customized to suit your business.
landing_site.conclusion: Your landing page is an investment in the future of your business. Submit a request, and we’ll make sure your clients choose you!
